6
7// ProgramPipeline.h: Defines the gl::ProgramPipeline class.
8// Implements GL program pipeline objects and related functionality.
9// [OpenGL ES 3.1] section 7.4 page 105.
10
11#ifndef LIBANGLE_PROGRAMPIPELINE_H_
12#define LIBANGLE_PROGRAMPIPELINE_H_
13
14#include <memory>
15
16#include "common/angleutils.h"
17#include "libANGLE/Debug.h"
18#include "libANGLE/Program.h"
19#include "libANGLE/ProgramExecutable.h"
20#include "libANGLE/RefCountObject.h"
21
22namespace rx
23{
24class GLImplFactory;
25class ProgramPipelineImpl;
26} // namespace rx
27
28namespace gl
29{
30class Context;
31class ProgramPipeline;
32
33class ProgramPipelineState final : angle::NonCopyable
34{
35 public:
36 ProgramPipelineState();
37 ~ProgramPipelineState();
38
39 const std::string &getLabel() const;
40
41 const ProgramExecutable &getProgramExecutable() const
42 {
43 ASSERT(mExecutable);
44 return *mExecutable;
45 }
46 ProgramExecutable &getProgramExecutable()
47 {
48 ASSERT(mExecutable);
49 return *mExecutable;
50 }
51
52 void activeShaderProgram(Program *shaderProgram);
53 void useProgramStages(const Context *context,
54 GLbitfield stages,
55 Program *shaderProgram,
56 std::vector<angle::ObserverBinding> *programObserverBindings);
57
58 Program *getActiveShaderProgram() { return mActiveShaderProgram; }
59
60 GLboolean isValid() const { return mValid; }
61
62 const Program *getShaderProgram(ShaderType shaderType) const { return mPrograms[shaderType]; }
63
64 bool usesShaderProgram(ShaderProgramID program) const;
65
66 void updateExecutableTextures();
67
68 private:
69 void useProgramStage(const Context *context,
70 ShaderType shaderType,
71 Program *shaderProgram,
72 angle::ObserverBinding *programObserverBindings);
73
74 friend class ProgramPipeline;
75
76 std::string mLabel;
77
78 // The active shader program
79 Program *mActiveShaderProgram;
80 // The shader programs for each stage.
81 ShaderMap<Program *> mPrograms;
82
83 GLboolean mValid;
84
85 ProgramExecutable *mExecutable;
86
87 bool mIsLinked;
88};
89
90class ProgramPipeline final : public RefCountObject<ProgramPipelineID>,
91 public LabeledObject,
92 public angle::ObserverInterface
93{
94 public:
95 ProgramPipeline(rx::GLImplFactory *factory, ProgramPipelineID handle);
96 ~ProgramPipeline() override;
97
98 void onDestroy(const Context *context) override;
99
100 void setLabel(const Context *context, const std::string &label) override;
101 const std::string &getLabel() const override;
102
103 const ProgramPipelineState &getState() const { return mState; }
104 ProgramPipelineState &getState() { return mState; }
105
106 const ProgramExecutable &getExecutable() const { return mState.getProgramExecutable(); }
107 ProgramExecutable &getExecutable() { return mState.getProgramExecutable(); }
108
109 rx::ProgramPipelineImpl *getImplementation() const;
110
111 Program *getActiveShaderProgram() { return mState.getActiveShaderProgram(); }
112 void activeShaderProgram(Program *shaderProgram);
113 Program *getLinkedActiveShaderProgram(const Context *context)
114 {
115 Program *program = mState.getActiveShaderProgram();
116 if (program)
117 {
118 program->resolveLink(context);
119 }
120 return program;
121 }
122
123 void useProgramStages(const Context *context, GLbitfield stages, Program *shaderProgram);
124
125 Program *getShaderProgram(ShaderType shaderType) const { return mState.mPrograms[shaderType]; }
126
127 void resetIsLinked() { mState.mIsLinked = false; }
128 ProgramMergedVaryings getMergedVaryings() const;
129 angle::Result link(const gl::Context *context);
130 bool linkVaryings(InfoLog &infoLog) const;
131 void validate(const gl::Context *context);
132 bool validateSamplers(InfoLog *infoLog, const Caps &caps);
133
134 bool usesShaderProgram(ShaderProgramID program) const
135 {
136 return mState.usesShaderProgram(program);
137 }
138
139 GLboolean isValid() const { return mState.isValid(); }
140
141 // ObserverInterface implementation.
142 void onSubjectStateChange(angle::SubjectIndex index, angle::SubjectMessage message) override;
143
144 void fillProgramStateMap(gl::ShaderMap<const gl::ProgramState *> *programStatesOut);
145
146 private:
147 void updateLinkedShaderStages();
148 void updateExecutableAttributes();
149 void updateTransformFeedbackMembers();
150 void updateShaderStorageBlocks();
151 void updateImageBindings();
152 void updateHasBooleans();
153 void updateExecutable();
154
155 std::unique_ptr<rx::ProgramPipelineImpl> mProgramPipelineImpl;
156
157 ProgramPipelineState mState;
158
159 std::vector<angle::ObserverBinding> mProgramObserverBindings;
160 angle::ObserverBinding mExecutableObserverBinding;
161};
162} // namespace gl
163
164#endif // LIBANGLE_PROGRAMPIPELINE_H_
165
